page.title: 17BADDESLEY CARNIVAL.
page.content: Every August the people of Baddesley hold a Carnival.There are decorated floats and people in fancy dress parading the streets.The procession comes to a halt in the Recreation Ground where there are stalls,games and races.Here are two memories of the 1985 Carnival.... "This year I was a pirate on the Cubs float.We decorated the boat with cardboard waves stuck on the side.I wore a red and white striped tee shirt and jeans which were cut off at the knee.We all waited for the Queen's Float to arrive and then we started.." "In the 1985 Carnival I was the Princess and my sister was Queen. I wore a blue lace dress with ribbons around the top.I carried some flowers which were real,not plastic.Later my family held a party at home for all our friends."
